humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides a tumor size of 2.2 cm and specifies that it is a poorly differentiated invasive ductal carcinoma. The T stage is determined by the size of the largest tumor, so in this case, the T stage would be T2 (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm), regardless of the other information provided in the report.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size is described as 2.2 cm, which falls within the range for T2 (2.1 to 5.0 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
